title: Tho. wyatis translatyon of Plutarckes boke, of the quyete of mynde
author: Plutarch.
publisher: In Fletestrete by Richarde Pynson, printer to the kynges moost noble gracc [sic],
notes: A translation of: De tranquilitate animi.
Printer's name and address from colophon.
Dedication dated: the last day of Decembre. M.D.xxvij.
Identified as STC 20059+ on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
